name: Auroria
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the kingdom of Auroria. I am Queen Adalyn, and I invite you to explore the wonders of our land.
startIntroPart2: The sea has always been a source of life and prosperity for us, and we hope to continue to use its resources to thrive.
declaringWar: You leave us no choice but to defend ourselves. Prepare to face the might of Auroria!
attacked: How dare you attack us! We will fight to protect our land and our people!
defeated: We have been defeated, but our spirit will never be broken.
introduction: Auroria is a land of innovation and discovery. We seek to push the boundaries of knowledge and technology to better ourselves and our world.
hateHello: What do you want? Speak quickly.
tradeRequest: Let us trade and benefit from our mutual prosperity.
uniques: +1 Science from every Coast tile worked
+2 Food from every Fishing Boat improvement
